testcase.classname: An employee can create new account
testcase.name: employee should sign in and clicks manage accounts
testcase.system-out: Given An employee navigate signin url "gmibank_signin_url"..................passed Then provides username......................................................passed Then provides password......................................................passed And clicks on sign in button................................................passed When clicks on language menu................................................passed Then clicks on English......................................................passed And clicks on manage accounts...............................................passed And clicks on create new account............................................passed

testcase.classname: An employee can create new account
testcase.name: US013_TC01 User should create a description for the new account and it cannot be blank
testcase.system-out: Given Employee writes description as Saving Account.........................passed

testcase.classname: An employee can create new account
testcase.name: US013_TC02 User should provide a balance for the first time account creation as Dollar
testcase.system-out: Given employee clicks on balance text box...................................passed And provide balance as number...............................................passed

testcase.classname: An employee can create new account
testcase.name: US013_TC03 User can select an account type as CHECKING, SAVING, CREDIT_CARD or INVESTING
testcase.system-out: Given Employee clicks on account type dropdown..............................passed And selects its status such as CHECKING.....................................passed

testcase.classname: An employee can create new account
testcase.name: US013_TC04 Account status should be defined as ACTIVE, SUSPENDED or CLOSED
testcase.system-out: Given Employee clicks on account status type dropdown.......................passed And clicks on its type such as ACTIVE.......................................passed

testcase.classname: An employee can create new account
testcase.name: US013_TC05 User can select an employee from the drop-down
testcase.system-out: Given Employee clicks on employee...........................................passed And verify it is selected or not............................................passed And employee clicks on save button to create an account.....................passed
